channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: S&P 500 now more likely to reach 7,200 next year, according to Morgan Stanley’s Wilson
item.description: Better earnings and a steadily high multiple should boost stocks, says Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Nike’s stock jumps after an analyst says ‘just buy it’ ahead of soccer World Cup
item.description: Nike’s stock extends its recent surge after J.P. Morgan upgraded it to overweight from neutral.

item.title: How Opendoor’s meme-stock rally helped fix a listing-requirement problem, for now
item.description: Opendoor wants more time “to assess market conditions and the Company’s stock price.”

item.title: ‘Vegas is not fun anymore’: $9 cups of coffee and pricier rooms are steering travelers away from the vacation mecca
item.description: Las Vegas has become pricier by many measures, though local officials point to a decline in international travel as the key reason for a recent touris...

item.title: Citi’s new Strata Elite credit card has a $595 annual fee. Here’s how its perks stack up against the competition.
item.description: Rising annual fees and excessive statement credits have led to some fatigue in the premium credit-card market — but consumer demand persists.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
